Text: Georgia Precedent AgreementsI met with Ben regarding the Precedent Agreement this evening He had the following questionscomments Shippers power plant construction by August then either Party may terminate this Precedent Agreement by providing the other Party written notice of such termination provided that such right to terminate must be exercised on or before August In any event unless the Shipper provides written notice to Transco on or before August that it will enter into a Service Agreement the Precedent Agreement will terminate automatically Can we make the Guaranty effective after August if we do not terminate the Precedent Agreement In talking to Gerald Nemec it also occurred to me that we need to determine any balance sheet effects of the Guaranty in relationship to this project I will check on this tomorrow and let you know Thanks RDG

athens mapForwarded by Raimund GrubeCorpEnron on AM Peter Hoyt PM To Raimund NRON cc Subject athens map Heres the maplet me know if you need any changes Topo map to follow after I download the file Pete
Re Florida SitesSteve Rose X should be the contact I would like to participate if possible R Grube
Re Florida Level B EstimatesJohn I will be back in the office on Monday if you hear anything today or on Friday please let me know RDG

Georgia Precedent AgreementsI met with Ben regarding the Precedent Agreement this evening He had the following questionscomments Shippers power plant construction by August then either Party may terminate this Precedent Agreement by providing the other Party written notice of such termination provided that such right to terminate must be exercised on or before August In any event unless the Shipper provides written notice to Transco on or before August that it will enter into a Service Agreement the Precedent Agreement will terminate automatically Can we make the Guaranty effective after August if we do not terminate the Precedent Agreement In talking to Gerald Nemec it also occurred to me that we need to determine any balance sheet effects of the Guaranty in relationship to this project I will check on this tomorrow and let you know Thanks RDG

Georgia and Florida Projects Cc Ruth I have confirmed the meeting with Williams to discuss the Athens and Hart Co projects for on Wednesday Location TBA We will meet with Allen Smith and Orlando Alvarez Regarding the Midway project in St Lucie County and other sites as well we need to get a rough estimate on the estimated schedule for completion In particular we need to know whether it is possible to get gas to the Midway site by May Is there any way we can talk to someone today about this Thanks Raimund D Grube
Purchase Option Noticethis is a draft of the original that I received that was structured like the one we used for Austin RDG

Coral Energy Agreements Cc The attached agreement was forwarded to me by Catherine Clark Do we have to amend the attached Agreement to reflect the assignment of the Purchase Option to the LLCs instead of Enron and is this possible under the master agreement Or does this assign the Purchase Option to Enron who will then assign it to the LLCs Please advise Also as Kay Mann Rose Engeldorf and I agreed on Friday evening we did not send out the purchase option notice However we still need to provide formal notice in order to provide sufficient time for WLB to make the appropriate arrangements The concern was whether Enron would trigger any balance sheet issues by providing notice to West LB I will be in the office by AM on Monday and would like to meet to discuss any outstanding issues as soon as possible Raimund D Grube
Coral DASHAttached is the final draft of the DASH I am circulating it for signatures Raimund D Grube

RE Transco Cornerstone PANonPrivilegedpst Thanks I will review this and get back to you by Friday RDG Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday September AM To Concannon Ruth Grube Raimund Subject Transco Cornerstone PA Attached is the precedent agreement with changes redlined I scanned their hardcopy I added that same outs that were included in the Momentum agreements but I left the dates blank Please review and let me know if you have any questions File Transco CornerstonePAREDdoc
